ni zoyenera zanji zomwe zimapangitsa munthu kukhala mtsogoleri wa dziko
51. Munthu ayenera kukhala ni zaka 35 ni kukhala mzika, kutengela ni Section 80, Chapter 8 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka zofunikira kuti munthu akhale mtsogoleri wa dziko.

2. Anthu amachotsedwa ngati sakukwanitsa udindo wawo, Section 198, Chapter 10 cha Constitution, chimafotokoza malamulo oti anthu ogwira ntchito m’boma kapena m'mabungwe azichotsedwa ngati sakuchita bwino kapena achita zachinyengo.

19. Mungadandaule ku Nyumba ya Malamulo kapena mabungwe ena a boma, izi zili mu Section 8, Chapter 6 cha Constitution, limene limapereka njira zomveka za kukonzekera ndondomeko ni kupereka madandaulo.

kodi ovlaza mzake pauchifwamba, naye ali ni ufulu wokhala ni moyo
17. Ali ni ufulu wokhala ni moyo ngakhale atakhala ni mulandu, malinga ni Section 16, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa moyo kwa aliyense osalola kugwidwa popanda chilungamo.

munthu womangidwa ali ni ufulu wanji
44. Ali ni ufulu wa chitetezo ni chilungamo, malinga ni Section 41, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wopeza chilungamo popanda tsankho kapena ziletso.

46. Munthu ayenera kutsatira ndondomeko za boma, izi zili mu Section 47, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, komwe malamulo amakonzera ndondomeko za kugwira ntchito ya umzika komanso kukhala mzika za dziko
